data.actual_result: The Highlighted UI trigger twice for both messages and are overlaying
data.expected_result: the UI should trigger once on the first message that was longholded
data.short_description: longholding 2 seperate messages with multitouch triggers Highlighted message UI twice.
data.steps_to_repro: - have a multitouch device - long hold 2 seperate messages - wait for the highlighted UI
